review: I am a cinephile and I am quite sure this is the best thing I have ever purchased. It connects to IMDB so you can see the movie rates and watch the trailer immediately. Instant video provides many movies and the price is reasonable. Another thing I like is the game section on fire TV. Games they provides are usually fun to play and you have varieties of choices.The only complain I have is the subtitle of movies.Sometimes it is not parallel with the movie. Rarely happens so far but when it happens it is really annoying. if you don't need subtitles this is not a problem at all.
